Counter Strike: Source is a multiplayer first-person shooter which is a remake of the original Counter Strike that focuses on the teams of Counter-Terrorists against Terrorists, this game includes plenty of maps including some well known maps such as de_dust2 with the game-mode of Bomb Defusal and cs_office having the game-mode of Hostage Rescue. All of this is put into a competitive environment which involves team-work and skill, unlike other first-person shooters out there.

This game takes quite a some knowledge and understanding of the game which can have a learning curve but is what makes it fun. This can mean learning the economics of the game, nade usage to shooting and compensating spray control. As you progress you will start to learn these things. Learning is what makes this game longer-lasting and more enjoyable than other first-person shooters.

The game has two game-modes where the main objective where the Counter-Terrorist try to prevent the Terrorists from planting at either Bomb sites A or B on selected maps. There are two ways you can win playing either side. As Counter-Terrorists you can eliminate the enemy team or defuse the bomb before it explodes. When playing as Terrorist you can win by doing the same thing as the Counter-Terrorist which is eliminating the enemy team or by planting the bomb and letting it explode.

The other game-mode is Hostage Rescue which has hostages that are placed where the Terrorist spawn. In this mode, you can also win by eliminating the enemy team. However instead of bomb sites, there are hostage points where the hostages are held by the Terrorists. The objective for the Counter-Terrorist are to rescue these hostage and take them back to the Counter-Terrorist spawn. This is where Terrorist are to defend the hostage and prevent the Counter-Terrorist from doing so.

These game-modes are what you would typically play in this game, but you will notice a lot of custom maps and servers which make up majority of the servers nowadays. This is because the majority of the community have moved onto CS:GO (Counter Strike: Global Offensive). But these game-modes that you do see on the browser have modes like mini-games, bhop, surf and plenty of other custom game-modes. These modes are a lot of fun though if you are looking for something to play with your mates.

Well worth buying it if it goes on sale a little bit cheaper as it is a little old and not worth the $20 at the moment. Worth all the 200+ hours on this game however there aren't as much servers as there use to be because as it is getting old. Although there are mods which are available that are a load of fun to play such as jailbreak and zombies. Hands down the best game for its time and maybe even today (at least for me). I do recommend this game to those who are thinking of purchasing it although servers are getting wiped. If you are wanting the competitve play which Counter Strike offers you can purchase CS:GO which is frequently updated with an active community.

El famoso juego que nos dio tantas horas de vicio en los ciber-cafés vuelve con gráficos mejorados. Sigue siendo una experiencia online muy divertida, con servidores con mods INCREÍBLES. Aparte, con este juego podrás jugar ''Prop Hunt'' y ''Trouble in Terrorist Town'' (entre otros modos) si tienes Garry's Mod. Sobran explicaciones, eso sí, preparate a ver mods muy raros xD.
Best. Game. Ever.

I like this game. Ive played it for 4 hours at a time before. Its a SUPER ADDICTING game. Its the same as Search And Destroy from the call of duty series. But Counter Strike: Global Offensive is MUCH better, because Global Offensive has the option for single player mode, it has much more maps, more game modes, and an over all better gaming expirence. I recommend this game for softcore online gamers, but i recommend Counter Strike: Global Offensive to gamers with a more hardcore, strategy based skill set.

Great game that supports Gmod and really brings out the FPS game tactics in you. DEFINITLY recommended to gamers who are practicing for FPS tournys. If you don't know what it is is its that you are a counter-terrorist or a terrorist. Terrorist objective: kill all of the Counter-terrorists before they rescue all of the hostages. Counter-terrorist objective: save all of the hostages or kill all of the terrorists. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Counter-strike is a unique fps game. You do not respawn when you die and your health is more realistic than most games. Not naming any *cough* 'Call of Duty'. You can play online with or without bots. This game is great, but it can get a boring playing it to much.The new textures and major aesthetic changes have more complex buildings and scenery which give a new feel to the game.

This is truly a great game you could spend hours playing and not get bored especially with the multiple games on servers like jailbreak minigames etc
10/10 definately a must buy

Counter Strike: Source es el gran avance del Counter Strike 1.6 y la verdad tuve una gran experiencia al jugarlo. Tanto los modos clásicos de bomba, como de_dust2 o de_mirage, hasta los modos de rehenes como cs_office o cs_assault. También la capacidad editable para hacer mapas específicos, como de Surf, BunnyHop, Soccer y entre otros, así como modos complejos como Jail Mod, me pareció increiblemente infinita y abierta para todas las mentes.
